metadata.title: CVE-2015-2750 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in URL-related API functions in Drupal 6.xbefore 6.35 and 7.x before 7.35 allows remote attackers to redirect usersto arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via vectors involvingthe "//" initial sequence.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.32-1+deb8u3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.32-1+deb8u3').
